Ini post pertama.

Contoh notasi persamaan matematis
\begin{align}
\sum F &= \sum m \times a\\
\sum F_x &= \sum m \times a_x\\
\sum F_y &= \sum m \times a_y\\
\theta &= \frac{\sum F_y}{\sum F_x}
\end{align}
